documents.document: This weekend won't be / a success if I don't get / some empanadas / #accidentalhaiku by @JulioxBrocana
I hate how little / kids just run around the mall / like it's Disney land / #accidentalhaiku by @karaann123
I woke up in a / bed full of bitches that I / ain't even fuckin' / #accidentalhaiku by @ZENMVSTER_
Don't be gone too long, / cause who's gonna be there to / love me when you're gone.. / #accidentalhaiku by @ZeusAllano
I want you wrapped in / my arms.... Like a burrito.... / Be my baeritto. 😍💕💞 / #accidentalhaiku by @Miranda_xx3
I'm just skeptical / of being tantalized by / the usual traits / #accidentalhaiku by @wetzel_jess
I burned my hand at / work and now it looks like a / dented tomato / #accidentalhaiku by @SuperNintendoOF
Somehow I knew she / was gonna make me feel like / an asshole for this / #accidentalhaiku by @hiimdav
My life is either / perfect or really shitty. / There's no in between. / #accidentalhaiku by @marissa_panzo
Noticing tan lines / after a day in the sun / is so rewarding / #accidentalhaiku by @_nikkiinik
You know you reach a / new level of creep when you / get blocked on Twitter 😂😂😂👌 / #accidentalhaiku by @CamWhitford98
I couldn't do it.... / like my body gotta rest / for atleast a year / #accidentalhaiku by @LashezNLipstick
Why can't screenwriters / at least try to make movies / similar to books? / #accidentalhaiku by @chwethington
woke up to my cat / crying locked in the closet / i feel horrible / #accidentalhaiku by @Genesis_Clock
I might be at work / but at least I'm not watching / Britain's got talent / #accidentalhaiku by @FEVB0B
I have a feeling / that things are about to take / a turn for the worse / #accidentalhaiku by @SeanReynolds101
I'm really quiet / around people I don't know / and that is not good / #accidentalhaiku by @tiatheakstonxx
some people pass through / our lives just to teach us / not to be like them. / #accidentalhaiku by @DjJtraxx
Don't blow my high let / me shine drama on the beat / I should take my time / #accidentalhaiku by @This_NiggaNRAM
You'll be amazed if / you knew how many people / really against you / #accidentalhaiku by @DiamondCatour
I'm taking a shit / at a party and there's no / toilet paper fuckkkk / #accidentalhaiku by @Skanktopus209
"Shoulda read the book." / Fuck you shoulda punched you in / your snotty ass face / #accidentalhaiku by @pea_raval
If bodybuilding / has a dark side, you know what? / I don't want to know. / #accidentalhaiku by @KenJennings
Los Angeles needs / LESS ARTISINAL BAR FOOD / and MORE FIX-IT SHOPS. / #accidentalhaiku by @JesseThorn
The awkward moment / when wikipedia has / copied your homework. / #accidentalhaiku by @caity_catt
I seriously / have no clue what I would do / without my boyfriend / #accidentalhaiku by @SaffronSpringer
If someone's loyal / and loves you with all their heart, / why are you trippen? / #accidentalhaiku by @CorleyOctavion
thanks for the advice / but some apps ignore line breaks / so slash is needed / #informationalhaiku for @timgorichanaz
Lmao / just tried passing mort my phone / instead of the blunt / #accidentalhaiku by @stevo2turnt
Sometimes I start to / think I like people and then / I'm like, nope, still don't. / #accidentalhaiku by @the_maggiejane
Remember when I / tried watching aristocats / a second ago / #accidentalhaiku by @KelbyHalfpop
I'm just sitting in / this studio just tryna / get to you baby / #accidentalhaiku by @rihanna
"I'm full 😞" "I'll help you!" / *takes donut from britni's hand* 😂😂😂 / I'm a good cousin / #accidentalhaiku by @lbarajasss
I hate it when I / don't forward a chain text and / I die the next day. / #accidentalhaiku by @rentalgamex0
Lmao / the garbage men just came and / smoked a bowl with me. / #accidentalhaiku by @laneskrischkes
Yeah you haven't seen / a video tape of a / dog fuckin a pig?!! / #accidentalhaiku by @Frankinfinger
My favorite part / of working out is drinking / chocolate milk after. / #accidentalhaiku by @morganliggan
If you're not telling / your girl how special she is, / the next nigga is / #accidentalhaiku by @elzsplashy
Anyone got room / in the suitcase to smuggle / me to Seattle? 😁 / #accidentalhaiku by @Im_Tanilee
That awkward moment / when someone walks in on you / singing to yourself. / #accidentalhaiku by @album69
it's storming outside / time to cuddle with pillows / under my blanket / #accidentalhaiku by @Yyuriii
This is the last time / you will see me wear pants for / like a good three months. / #accidentalhaiku by @whuddupcarolyn
People who don't try / shouldn't complain that they don't / achieve what they want. / #accidentalhaiku by @avonamazing
Don't know how people / kiss in the mornings because / stank ass morning breath / #accidentalhaiku by @morganperdue
Sweetwater tavern / express chicken wing combo / is calling my name / #accidentalhaiku by @Trippy_Nate
Have you ever just / wanted to pick up and move / somewhere different? / #accidentalhaiku by @MikeTalley73
IF I HEAR THE WORD / ARMPIT ONE MORE TIME I AM / GOING TO LOSE IT / #accidentalhaiku by @loveyahunter
I applaud myself / when I successfully write / a cute text message. / #accidentalhaiku by @SabrinaBrianne
If it mentions a / Dixie Cup it's probably / a Luke Bryan song. / #accidentalhaiku by @3cheers20years
I really needa / get back into boxing or / some type of fighting / #accidentalhaiku by @JoshBurrnett
It's crazy to think / about how many countries / I've lost hair ties in. / #accidentalhaiku by @taylorswift13
Are you allowed to / impeach a president for / gross incompetence? / #accidentalhaiku by @realDonaldTrump
My motivation / ran out a long time ago. / It's all habit now. / #accidentalhaiku by @bababrittney
i hope you didn't / forget about me, but I / kinda hope you did. / #accidentalhaiku by @jaythepoet_
MAKE BETTER CHOICES. / START BY VOTING FOR JASLEEN / FOR SAC PRESIDENT! 🎉 / #accidentalhaiku by @galaa_c
Great gig Sunderland / my clothes are soaked god damn rain !!!! / We still had fun right? / #accidentalhaiku by @Real_Liam_Payne
We're just tiny specs \ in a vast universe man \ and it's rad as hell! \ #accidentalhaiku by @inwithzen
My mom just told me / she wants to get me a truck.. / what's in her coffee? / #accidentalhaiku by @EvanEvankennedy
It's all fun and games / until Emily gets drunk / and loses her keys / #accidentalhaiku by @RamiRogers
I used to look up / to Justin beiber now he / is a total thug / #accidentalhaiku by @lcmooney74
My only advice / is to get you some money / & watch how shit change...... / #accidentalhaiku by @TShow14_CT
My sanity is / beginning to diminish / a lot going on / #accidentalhaiku by @Kevo_021
I want to go back / to canada bc I / want fries & plum sauce / #accidentalhaiku by @ashleeyreneexox
If you have to ask / if you're a priority, / you're probably not. / #accidentalhaiku by @jazzyrae
I don't wanna be / afraid I wanna wake up / feeling beautiful / #accidentalhaiku by @roochiriquelme_
Does some one wanna / hang out with me and Nicole, / some one who can drive? / #accidentalhaiku by @erika_dillender
I wish people could / send their thoughts and prayers without / posting about it / #accidentalhaiku by @_JohnBomb_
Shorty couldn't wait / to get them j's on ha feet, / damn they juhh came out / #accidentalhaiku by @SELF__madeQUAN
There are some pretty / gals that smell pretty good with / pretty ugly feets. / #accidentalhaiku by @theGintleman
Enjoying a much / needed date night with my wife. / Checking out X Men. / #accidentalhaiku by @joshcorum
I swear I'm suppose / to be cleaning my room and / I haven't started / #accidentalhaiku by @Chuggz__
my aunts trying to / get me to take Jell-O shots / behind my moms back 😂👌 / #accidentalhaiku by @sick_paradox
I like to get drunk / and meet other drunk people / and become drunk friends🍻 / #accidentalhaiku by @BaconBorders
The weather here is / overcast and the sea is / the same shade of grey / #accidentalhaiku by @30secondstodani
i want to get a / tattoo of a bible verse / when i get older / #accidentalhaiku by @k_kristen5
I don't give a fuck. / I just do whatever and / hope nothing happens 😂 / #accidentalhaiku by @Markayy__
I seriously / was crying because I missed / Kid Cudi's concert 😭😫😪 / #accidentalhaiku by @GenieBeear
It's horrible when / there's a spider in your room / and it goes missing 😭 / #accidentalhaiku by @Faaaisaaall
My boyfriend can know / all my passwords because I / have nothing to hide 😘👌 / #accidentalhaiku by @destinyy_bri
Shock tactics Asda! / A gnome mankini doesn't / cover big bollocks / #accidentalhaiku by @BronwenWarman
girls who post pictures / of them tanning need to stop. / no one really cares / #accidentalhaiku by @BrookUrbanski
The world will break your / heart in ten ways till Sunday, / that's a guarantee / #accidentalhaiku by @olbrowning8
I sleep fully clothed / so I can wake up and get / straight to the money. / #accidentalhaiku by @wizkhalifa
Sometimes your parents / act like big ass babies when / they don't get their way!!! / #accidentalhaiku by @leggssassy
Someone make me a / cup of tea then cuddle me / to sleep pretty please / #accidentalhaiku by @such_a_fuck_up
Sometimes during sex / I perform a double pop / shovit late kick flip. / #accidentalhaiku by @DaneCook
I just can't keep up / with rihannas hair now she's / not on Instagram / #accidentalhaiku by @Dainlouis_
That awkward moment / when you check the price tag and / sadly walk away.. / #accidentalhaiku by @nessyzx
You a college chick, / keep twerkin baby, might earn / you a scholarship / #accidentalhaiku by @NotorioussCee_
Cold shower becuz / I'm so sunburnt I look like / a ripe tomato / #accidentalhaiku by @laurenmartes8
I really wish I / could go back to freshman year / and fix everything / #accidentalhaiku by @howethan
That 4 hour nap / earlier today was not / a bright idea. / #accidentalhaiku by @jayryanwoods
WHERE CAN I SIGN UP / TO BE PRETTY I'M TIRED / OF BEING UGLY / #accidentalhaiku by @cliffnips
I wanna go back / in time.....to change everything / that ever went wrong / #accidentalhaiku by @youngBrighton
My aunties always / tell me to start doing shots / always ends badly / #accidentalhaiku by @fionadonald_
Macaroni Grill / always trying to teach me / French in the bathrooms / #accidentalhaiku by @rachellynn_14
Any ideas / about which sport is the most / dangerous to watch? / #accidentalhaiku by @RichardWiseman
You know you're high when / everything you do feels like / a fucking mission. / #accidentalhaiku by @TedOfficialPage
cheech: ay relax homes / *chong pulls out a bag of weed* / lmao / #accidentalhaiku by @SamTheDisaster
Grey's Anatomy / will never be the same and / that just really sucks. / #accidentalhaiku by @CaseyErnfelt
